articles.description: How do volcanologists determine the height of eruptive plumes from Yellowstone’s past explosive eruptions? Ironically, you have to dig into the ground to get the answer.

articles.author: Richard Tribou
articles.title: NASA websites no longer promote ‘first woman’ on the moon for Artemis - Orlando Sentinel
articles.description: NASA websites have dropped references to landing the first woman on the moon as part of the goals for its Artemis program.
articles.content:
NASA websites have dropped references to landing the first woman on the moon as part of the goals for its Artemis program.
Updated pages as of Friday for the program no longer feature the statement:… [+4410 chars]
